review_title: Excellent work environment and learning opportunities
job_title: Customer Service Associate in Toronto, ON
pros: A great mission, a team that is effective, and management and board that are all on the same page. Good opportunities for learning.
cons: There are not any to think of.

review_title: Average Company to work with Refurbished Computers and Electronics
job_title: Customer Service Associate in Toronto, ON
pros: I am responsible for daily operations of the small business, which is a non-profit organization and a social enterprise. I am going there for only for one day and getting a basic pay.
cons: I am not getting enough part-time hours, which I need for supporting the tuition for my College education.

job_title: Computer Repair Technician in Vancouver, BC
pros:
Office is informal and relaxed, with great people who are kind and motivating.

Able to voice concerns freely, and talk to peers as long as job gets finished.
cons: Be ready to do some heavy lifting once in a while, and switch from one job to the next.
